name: Morning / Coffee / Poop
description:
So you've woken up and had your first cup of coffee in the morning. Now it's time to accomplish your every morning ritual helped by the lovely demons.

Morning / Coffee / Poop is a 2 player party game played on a shared single controller or keyboard. Draw the symbols faster than your opponent and make your player poop rainbows!

The game was originally created in 48 hours as part of Global Game Jam 2016. Few weeks later @solkar and I decided to fix a few game play issues and put the game out here for everyone to enjoy

Code: Karlos Zafra (@solkar) and Juuso Väätäinen (@fatsopanda)
Art: Laura Oravakangas and Iva Kojadinovic (@ivdza_)
Animations, assisted art and code: Miikael Vuorio

Special thanks to Finnish Game Jam 2016 Helsinki, Arabia, site's students for creating sound design and music for the game: Julius Jappinen, Henry Keinälä-Sound and Mikko Saarinen
